name: Pip Premier
description:
A top down shooter with randomly changing stats!

Using 3 different weapons and a dash move, fight off waves of increasingly powerful dice-themed enemies.

At the end of every wave, you will gain a small amount of points that are then randomly distributed among your possible skills. Affected skills include your weapons, movement speed, weapon knockback and health. Every wave is a little different!

The official goal is to reach Level 50 from Level 0, but the game will let you go beyond that, and even select the level you start at.

Post your highest reached level in the comments!

Good luck!
